remarks.format: ## Remarks 区域是可伸缩的，因为它的坐标是在世界坐标中指定的。A region is scalable because its coordinates are specified in world coordinates. 但在绘图图面上，其内部依赖于表示它的像素的大小和形状。On a drawing surface, however, its interior is dependent on the size and shape of the pixels representing it. 应用程序可以使用区域来剪裁绘图操作的输出。An application can use regions to clip the output of drawing operations. 这些区域称为剪辑区域。These regions are called clipping regions. 有关使用区域进行剪辑的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：对区域使用剪辑](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-clipping-with-a-region)。For more information on using regions for clipping, see [How to: Use Clipping with a Region](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-clipping-with-a-region). 应用程序还可以使用命中测试操作中的区域，如检查某个点或矩形是否与某个区域相交。An application can also use regions in hit-testing operations, such as checking whether a point or a rectangle intersects a region. 有关使用区域进行命中测试的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：对区域使用命中测试](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-hit-testing-with-a-region)。For more information on using regions for hit-testing, see [How to: Use Hit Testing with a Region](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-hit-testing-with-a-region). 应用程序可以使用 方法和对象填充区域 。An application can fill a region by using the method and a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码示例演示如何使用 从一个对象为 另一个对象设置 。The code example demonstrates how to use the from one object to set the for another . remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 会允许出于其他目的重新分配此所使用的资源 。Calling allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 构造函数和 和 方法。The following code example demonstrates the constructor and the and methods. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `FillRegionExcludingPath` 在处理窗体事件时调用方法，并将 `e` 作为传递 。Paste the code into a form and call the `FillRegionExcludingPath` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 图形上下文的当前转换用于计算绘制图面上的内部区域。The current transformation of the graphics context is used to compute the region interior on the drawing surface. 边框并不总是可能的最小边框，具体取决于当前的转换。The bounding rectangle is not always the smallest possible bounding rectangle depending on the current transformation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 并向其添加一个椭圆。Creates a and adds an ellipse to it. - 用蓝色填充路径，并将其绘制到屏幕上。Fills the path with blue and draws it to the screen. - 创建一个使用的区域 。Creates a region that uses the . - 获取与第二个矩形组合后的区域的 nonexcluded 区域。Gets the nonexcluded area of the region when combined with the second rectangle. - 获取区域的边框，并以红色将其绘制到屏幕。Gets the bounding rectangle for the region and draws it to the screen in red. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕蓝色。Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in blue. - 从矩形创建区域。Creates a region from the rectangle. - 创建变换矩阵并将其设置为45度。Creates a transformation matrix and sets it to 45 degrees. - 将转换应用于区域。Applies the transformation to the region. - 用红色填充变换后的区域，并将变换后的区域绘制为红色。Fills the transformed region with red and draws the transformed region to the screen in red. 请注意，红色矩形从原始矩形旋转了45度，用蓝色显示。Notice that the red rectangle is rotated 45 degrees from the original rectangle, shown in blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]
